verbose_text: This allows us to verify possible non specific inhibitory effects when used on K562 cell clones subjected to erythroid differentiation which produce, upon treatment with mithramycin (MTH), high levels of Hb Gower 1 (zeta 2 epsilon 2), Hb Portland (zeta 2 gamma 2), HbF (alpha 2 gamma 2) and HbA (alpha 2 beta 2).
